q2: Do you think Spain have a chance in the next World Cup?
a2: Spain has no chance without Pele.
q3: Who is the top player without Pele?
a3: In my opinion Iniesta is one of the top plays ever played for Spain.
q4: What are the best clubs in Spain?
a4: The top three clubs are Barcelona, Real Madrid, and Athletico Madrid.
q5: Is Spain national team losing steam?
a5: They have performed better in the past certainly
